overview: Dr. Miramar is a psychiatrist, who specializes in Addiction Psychiatry. He is expertan in the treatment of substance abuse Co-Occurring Disorders, including PTSD, Anxiety, Depression, ADHD, among others. After completing his medical education in California, Dr. Steven became a professor of Psychiatry at the University of California. He has over 12 years of specialized experience in treating patients with addictions and other related illnesses.
